subject: Build new junit.jar
msgSnippet: Ok.... something easy for someone. I searched the junit.org site but can not seem to find an ant script or instructions on how to build a new junit.jar. I
messageBody:
Ok.... something easy for someone. I searched the junit.org site but can not
seem to find an 'ant' script or instructions on how to build a new
junit.jar. I want to add some debugging code in and trace it.

Can anyone point me in the right direction.

thanks,
johnj
